title: Marriott sees India as a ‘shining star’ for growth opportunities
description: According to Rajeev Menon, president of Marriott International for Asia Pacific excluding China, India continues to be a significant  growth market for the hospitality giant. Marriott plans to open its 150th hotel in Katra next month. Marriott aims to operate 250 hotels with 50,000 keys in India over the next five years.
